about.description: I'm passionate about technology and problem-solving. I aim to create useful, user-friendly applications and deliver high-quality results, whether it's on the frontend, backend, or full-stack.

contact.description: If you're interested in working with me, let's talk! I'm excited to explore new opportunities.
contact.findMeOn: You can also find me on these platforms:

projects.description: My projects highlight a range of technical skills and creativity. From a static HTML and CSS website for a psychologist, to a Python command line app for restaurant delivery, and full-stack applications like 'Smells Like Vacay' for vacation packing and 'Cool the Earth' for environmental awareness. Each project reflects my diverse skills and evolving expertise.

climateCircles.title: Climate Circles
climateCircles.description: Website for a psychologist that hosts workshops and climate circles

vacay.title: Smells Like Vacay
vacay.description: A full-stack application to help users pack efficiently for their vacations, featuring interactive checklists and packing suggestions.

coolTheEarth.title: Cool the Earth
coolTheEarth.description: An application promoting environmental awareness with features for tracking and reducing personal carbon footprints.

restaurantDelivery.title: Pasta la Vista
restaurantDelivery.description: A Python command-line application designed for managing restaurant delivery orders and logistics.

skills.description: I'm adept at using a range of modern technologies to build versatile and efficient applications.

contactForm.successMessage: Thank you for your message! I will get back to you soon.

collaborativeProjects.description: My collaborative projects demonstrate my ability to work effectively in a team environment using Agile methodologies. Through these projects, I gained hands-on experience with Git commands, conflict resolution, pull requests, and merging. Working alongside team members, I contributed to building innovative solutions and learned the importance of communication and teamwork in achieving project goals. All collaborative projects were completed during 5-day hackathons organized by Code Institute.

theLoversBlog.title: The Lovers Blog
theLoversBlog.description: A Valentine's-themed hackathon project by Cupid-Devils, allowing users to post tips for a better love life.

happyHacks.title: Happy Hacks
happyHacks.description: Happy Hacks offers motivational tips to boost happiness. Users can view random tips, create their own, and interact with others posts.

neuroSisters.title: Neuro Sisters
neuroSisters.description: A site for women caring for neurodivergent adults, providing support, resources, and a community for health and wellness.

starQuiz.title: Star Quiz
starQuiz.description: A Star Wars quiz that guides you through planets visited by Luke Skywalker.
